T02D2178:36b-0: @36b * // rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya ba ni //
T02D2178:36b-1: mandala kha dog ser po la //
T02D2178:36b-2: khru do khru phyed khru gang du //
T02D2178:36b-3: bskor te gru bzhi'am zur brgyad du ;
T02D2178:36b-4: ; byas nas sor gnyis sor bzhi can //
T02D2178:36b-5: dbus su rin chen 'bar bas mtshan //
T02D2178:36b-6: bar du me ri'i kha khyer steng //
T02D2178:36b-7: rin chen rdo rjes bskor bar bri //
T02D2178:36b-8: ser po'i rgyan chas bgos nas ni //
T02D2178:36b-9: byang phyogs ngos su kha bltas la //
T02D2178:36b-10: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul bsgoms nas //
T02D2178:36b-11: las kyi bum pa sbyang sogs bya'o //
T02D2178:36b-13: kha dog ser po dbus kyi cha //
T02D2178:36b-14: thab khung dbus su brtsegs par bya //
T02D2178:36b-15: khru gang khru phyed mdzub gang du //
T02D2178:36b-16: dri zhim spangs pa yam shing bya //
T02D2178:36b-17: las kyi bum pas bsangs nas ni //
T02D2178:36b-18: mchod rdzas ser po la sogs rnams //
T02D2178:37a-2: me sbar brtag cing thab khung sbyang //
T02D2178:37a-3: thab bskyed me lha bskyed pa ni //
T02D2178:37a-4: sde tshan drug pa'i gsum pa dang //
T02D2178:37a-5: gnyis pa lnga pa'i dang po ni //
T02D2178:37a-6: bskyed pa la ni bsngags par gsungs //
T02D2178:37a-7: me lha ser bo zhal gcig ni //
T02D2178:37a-8: phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis dbang chen gdan ;
T02D2178:37a-9: / spyan drangs bstims te dbang bskur ro //
T02D2178:37a-10: mchod pa la sogs byas nas ni //
T02D2178:37a-11: de nas sreg rdzas rnams ni dbul //
T02D2178:37a-12: rtsa sngags nyid la mtha' bzhi ru //
T02D2178:37a-13: gzar bu rin chen rdo rjes bya'o //
T02D2178:37a-14: rgyas par bstan pa zhi dang mthun //
T02D2178:37a-15: man ngag nyis skor la sogs kyang //
T02D2178:37a-16: zhi dang mthun te khyad par ni //
T02D2178:37a-17: 'od zer sna bug zhugs nas ni //
T02D2178:37a-18: snying ga dag tu phyin nas ni //
T02D2178:37a-19: lus kun rtsa yi rlung rnams dang //
T02D2178:37a-20: byang chub sems ni gsal zhing rgyas //
T02D2178:37a-21: yang na 'od zer lus kun la //
T02D2178:37a-22: khyab pas tshe dang bsod nams dang //
T02D2178:37a-24: tha ma dgang blugs bstod par bya //
T02D2178:37a-26: thugs ka nyid du gos sngon can //
T02D2178:37a-27: bskyed nas spyan drangs bstim byas la //
T02D2178:37a-28: dbang bskur mchod pa la sogs bya //
T02D2178:37a-29: dgang blugs bstod nas bshags pa bya //
T02D2178:37a-30: ye shes gshegs nas ting 'dzin bsdu //
T02D2178:37a-31: yi ge bcu bdun mtha' bsgyur la //
T02D2178:37a-32: bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu //
T02D2178:37a-33: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te bya //
T02D2178:37a-34: me lha rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni //
T02D2178:37a-35: cho ga la sogs gong bzhin bya //
T02D2178:37a-36: nyi shu rtsa gcig nas bzung nas //
T02D2178:37a-37: stong gi bar du tshun chad du //
T02D2178:37a-38: sbyor ba gnyis po gang byas kyang //
T02D2178:37a-40: / thun gsum sbyin sreg sbyor ka las //
T02D2178:37a-41: rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya'o //
T02D2178:37a-42: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o //
